refnamediv.refpurpose: A C gateway function which provides the number of output arguments present in the calling Scilab function

listitem.para: Scilab environment pointer, pass in "pvApiCtx" provided by api_scilab.h
the pointer on the number of output arguments present in the calling Scilab function

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: getNbOutputArgument provides a C gateway function which provides the number of output arguments present in the calling Scilab function. You must include api_scilab.h to benefit from this function.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C gateway function can take several output arguments and prints in the Scilab console the integer corresponding to the number of output arguments detected in the calling Scilab function.
